name: realm-quiz-wars
description: A knowledge-based card game where Reddit communities battle through quiz challenges

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CLIENT,SERVER,DEVVIT" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:devvit"
scripts.launch: npm run build && npm run deploy && devvit publish
